subject: Track and Field
lead_paragraph: The Reebok Grand Prix, a New York meet that has become one of the best-known events in the country, will become part of the international track federation’s new Diamond League circuit starting in 2010.
snippet: The Reebok Grand Prix, a New York meet that has become one of the best-known events in the country, will become part of the international track federation’s new Diamond League circuit starting in 2010.
